Title: Xaml Formatter for VS 2013
Description: Xaml Formatter for VS 2013 is a fork of Xaml Markup Styler Visual Studio 2012 Extension repackaged for VS 2013 preview.
HomeWiki:
Xaml Format for VS 2013 is a fork of Xaml Markup Styler Visual Studio 2012 Extension redone for Visual Studio 2013. There are no plans currently to change the operation of the extension.

If you want to reward the writer, go to his page, and look for a donate link, or give the tool a nice review.
